page.title: 13A SCHOOL DAY IN HORBURY 1985
page.content: I get up and have breakfast of toast and cornflakes.I go to school either in the car or walk. We go into school at 9.00am,and go straight into the hall for assembly.After assembly we have English until 10.30am,then it is playtime. At playtime I play at budge. It is a game we play in circles on the playground.We have to run from one to another and shout budge. At 10.45am we come in and have Maths until 12.00.At 12.00 we go for dinner,for my dinner I have sandwiches,other people have a school dinner or go home for dinner. In the afternoon we may different lessons such as topic,music,P.E.and art.School finishes for the day at 3.30pm.
